title: Fresh Install
custom_preconds: Given device language is set to Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user fresh installs At Bat
and launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the paywall should be in Spanish
And the links to FAQ and other web pages should be Spanish pages

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the favorite team selector during onboarding
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the descriptions, titles and buttons should be in Spanish
But all the team names should be in English

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the notification settings during onboarding
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the descriptions, alert types titles and buttons should be in Spanish
But all the team names should be in English

title: Slide Out Menu
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user opens the slide out menu
custom_expected: Then all items should have configurable names based on Spanish specific Extras file

title: Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user navs to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the following text should be in Spanish:

Nav bar title
Date
MLB.TV Game of the Day text
Game state headers
Game status/inning status

title: News
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user navs to the News Indices
custom_expected:
Then the following should be in Spanish: 

Section title
Article index with specific content

title: Video
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the Video Indices
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following should be in Spanish: 

Section title
Video index with specific content

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user searches within the video section
Or the user filters the team indices within the video section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then Spanish specific indices should be searched

title: Standings
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user navs to Standings
custom_expected:
Then the following should be in Spanish:

Tab titles
Section headers
Column labels
"current as of.." text
Clinch indicator key
Wild Card description text

title: Stats
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to Stats
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following should be in Spanish:

Section title
Tab labels (batting, pitching)
Filters in drop down selectors (Team vs. Player, League filter, season info)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user opens the player's player card through the stats section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a Spanish player card URL should be loaded

title: Teams
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and device language is set to Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the Teams list
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then only the section title should be in Spanish
and not the team names

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to a Team Page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following should be in Spanish, and driven off of a Spanish team mashup:
(ex: http://content.mlb.com/search/atbat/es/android/phone/nym.json)

Scoreboard labels in top score module for scheduled game and live game info
Labels for button on main view. (Audio, Box, Gameday etc.)
Section titles for team page sections
Articles should be from Spanish indices
Buttons should be Spanish
Videos should be from Spanish indices
Ads should be Spanish sourced
Tickets header
Tickets locale dates
Tickets link to Spanish ticket URLS if available in team config
Labels of configurable links in More section (and should take user to Spanish link webviews)
Settings button
